mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderHeader.id", boh.order_num AS "orderHeader.orderNum", boh.order_type AS "orderHeader.orderType", boh.cust_id AS "orderHeader.customer.id", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.p_line_no AS "pLineNo", a.sku_shelf_id as "shelfInfo.id", si.name as "shelfInfo.opShelfInfo.name", si.id as "shelfInfo.opShelfInfo.id", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", bsi.name as "skuInfo.name", a.buy_price as "buyPrice",
a.part_no AS "partNo", a.sku_name AS "skuName", bsi.item_no AS "skuInfo.itemNo", bsi.prod_id as "skuInfo.productInfo.id", a.unit_price AS "unitPrice", a.sent_qty as "sentQty", a.ord_qty AS "ordQty", a.suply_id as "suplyis.id", soo.name as "suplyis.name", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.commission_ratio AS "commissionRatio", off.id AS "vendor.id", off.name AS "vendor.name", us.id AS "primary.id", us.mobile AS "primary.mobile", a.status as "delFlag"

LEFT join sys_user su on a.create_id=su.id left join biz_sku_info bsi on a.sku_id=bsi.id left join biz_order_header boh on a.order_id=boh.id LEFT JOIN biz_op_shelf_sku ois on a.sku_shelf_id=ois.id Left Join biz_op_shelf_info si on si.id = ois.shelf_id
LEFT join sys_office soo on soo.id=a.suply_id LEFT JOIN biz_product_info pro ON pro.id = bsi.prod_id LEFT JOIN sys_office off ON off.id = pro.vendor_id LEFT JOIN sys_user us ON us.id = off.primary_person
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( reqDetailIds ) AS reqDetailIds, GROUP_CONCAT( detailIds ) AS detailIds, sum( totalReqQty ) AS "totalReqQty", sum( totalOrdQty ) AS "totalOrdQty", vendorId AS "vendorId", vendorName AS "vendorName" FROM ( ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( rd.id ) AS "reqDetailIds", '' AS "detailIds", sum( rd.req_qty ) AS "totalReqQty", 0 AS "totalOrdQty", rd.vendor_id AS "vendorId", rd.vendor_name AS "vendorName" FROM ( SELECT rd.id, rd.sku_id, rd.req_qty, rd.send_qty, rd.recv_qty, rd.header_id, rd.line_no, pi.vendor_id, pi.vendor_name FROM biz_request_header rh, biz_request_detail rd, biz_sku_info si, biz_product_info pi WHERE rh.biz_status BETWEEN 5 AND 20 AND rh.biz_status != 15 AND rh.STATUS = 1 AND rd.STATUS = 1 AND rd.header_id = rh.id AND si.id = rd.sku_id AND pi.id = si.prod_id AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT por.so_line_no, por.so_id FROM biz_po_order_req por ,biz_po_header ph WHERE por.status = 1 AND ph.status = 1 AND por.so_line_no = rd.line_no AND por.so_id = rd.header_id AND por.so_type = 2 and ph.id=por.po_id and is_prew=0 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_test_account ta WHERE rh.from_id = ta.object_id AND ta.object_name = 'sys_office' ) ) rd GROUP BY rd.vendor_id ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '' AS "reqDetailIds", GROUP_CONCAT( od.id ) AS "detailIds", 0 AS "totalReqQty", sum( od.ord_qty ) AS "totalOrdQty", od.vendor_id AS "vendorId", od.vendor_name AS "vendorName" FROM ( SELECT od.id, od.sku_id, od.ord_qty, od.sent_qty, od.order_id, od.suply_id, od.line_no, pi.vendor_id, pi.vendor_name FROM biz_order_header oh, biz_order_detail od, biz_sku_info si, biz_product_info pi WHERE ( od.suply_id = 0 OR od.suply_id = 721 ) AND od.order_id = oh.id AND oh.STATUS = 1 AND od.STATUS = 1 AND oh.order_type != 5 AND oh.biz_status BETWEEN 15 AND 19 AND oh.biz_status != 18 AND od.ord_qty > od.sent_qty AND si.id = od.sku_id AND pi.id = si.prod_id AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT por.so_line_no, por.so_id FROM biz_po_order_req por ,biz_po_header ph WHERE por.status = 1 AND ph.status = 1 AND por.so_line_no = od.line_no AND por.so_id = od.order_id AND por.so_type = 1 and ph.id=por.po_id and is_prew=0 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_test_account ta WHERE oh.cust_id = ta.object_id AND ta.object_name = 'sys_office' ) ) od GROUP BY od.vendor_id ) ) t1 GROUP BY vendorId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO biz_order_detail( id, order_id, line_no, p_line_no,
sku_shelf_id,
sku_id,
quality,
color,
standard,
part_no, sku_name, unit_price, buy_price, sent_qty, ord_qty,
suply_id,
create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderHeader.id}, #{lineNo}, #{pLineNo},
#{shelfInfo.id},
#{skuInfo.id},
#{quality},
#{color},
#{standard},
#{partNo}, #{skuName}, #{unitPrice}, #{buyPrice}, #{sentQty}, #{ordQty},
#{suplyis.id},
#{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_order_detail SET order_id = #{orderHeader.id}, line_no = #{lineNo}, p_line_no = #{pLineNo},
sku_shelf_id=#{shelfInfo.id},
sku_id = #{skuInfo.id},
quality=#{quality},
color = #{color},
standard = #{standard},
part_no = #{partNo}, sku_name = #{skuName},
unit_price = #{unitPrice},
buy_price = #{buyPrice},
sent_qty = #{sentQty}, ord_qty = #{ordQty},
suply_id=#{suplyis.id},
suply_id=0,
create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select max(a.line_no) from biz_order_detail a where a.order_id=#{orderHeader.id}

SELECT oh.id AS "orderHeader.id", oh.order_num AS "orderHeader.orderNum", cust.id AS "cust.id", cust.name AS "cust.name", cust.phone AS "cust.phone", oh.biz_status AS "orderHeader.bizStatus", si.name AS "skuInfo.name", si.item_no AS "skuInfo.itemNo", od.ord_qty AS "ordQty", od.sent_qty AS "sentQty", od.id AS "id" FROM biz_order_detail od LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info si ON si.id = od.sku_id LEFT JOIN biz_order_header oh ON oh.id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN sys_office cust ON cust.id = oh.cust_id LEFT JOIN biz_detail_invoice di ON di.order_header_id = oh.id LEFT JOIN biz_invoice bi ON bi.id = di.invoice_id WHERE od.status = 1 AND oh.status = 1 AND oh.order_type != 4 AND bi.id = #{invoiceId}
